attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2008-1485

Date: 2008-07-30

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Pierre Dallaire, de la ville de Gatineau dans la province de Québec, un avocat, soit nommé juge de la Cour supérieure pour les districts de Hull, Labelle et Pontiac, dans la province de Québec, avec résidence à Hull ou dans le voisinage immédiat de ce lieu.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Pierre Dallaire, of the City of Gatineau in the Province of Quebec, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the districts of Hull, Labelle and Pontiac, in the Province of Quebec, with residence at Hull or in its immediate vicinity.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Pierre Dallaire, of the City of Gatineau in the Province of Quebec, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the districts of Hull, Labelle and Pontiac, in the Province of Quebec, with residence at Hull or in its immediate vicinity.
